entry.value: select 'BAN' as "src_sys", spriden_id "netid", spriden_pidm as "src_uid", tele.sprtele_phone_area || '-' ||tele.SPRTELE_PHONE_NUMBER "telephone_num", tele.SPRTELE_TELE_CODE "telephone_type", st.STVTELE_DESC "type_desc", to_char(systimestamp,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "src_ts" from spriden iden, sprtele tele, STVTELE st where iden.spriden_pidm = tele.sprtele_pidm and tele.SPRTELE_TELE_CODE=st.STVTELE_CODE and spriden_id='JPE37811'

select 'HUB' as "src_sys", pk.NETID "netid", pk.PERSON_KEY_VALUE as "src_uid", p.NATIONAL_DESTINATION_CODE || '-' || p.SUBSCRIBER_NUMBER "telephone_num", nvl(ptk.EBS_HR_PHONE_TYPE,ptk.BANNER_PHONE_TYPE) "telephone_type", ptk.PHONE_TYPE_DESC "type_desc", to_char(systimestamp,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "src_ts" from hub.person_key pk, hub.person_phone pp, hub.phone p, HUB.PHONE_TYPE_KEY ptk where pk.PERSON_KEY_VALUE = pp.PERSON_KEY_VALUE and pp.PHONE_KEY_VALUE = p.PHONE_KEY_VALUE and pp.PHONE_TYPE_KEY_VALUE = ptk.PHONE_TYPE_KEY_VALUE and pk.netid='JPE37811'

select 'MYC' as "src_sys", 'JPE37811' as "netid", '3435696' as "src_uid", '310-5790537' as "telephone_num", 'PR' as "telephone_type", 'Permanent' as "type_desc", to_char(systimestamp,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "src_ts" from dual
